title: The Kinda Funny Crew Hits The Links To Watch The Greg vs Andy Rematch Of The Year!
description:
As the smack talk continued into the new year, Greg and Andy have decided to settle the score on the links of Everybody's Golf. So grab your popcorn and enjoy an afternoon of golf and fun with the Kinda Funny Crew.
